front.title: The Blocks eXtensible eXchange Protocol Framework

abstract.t: This memo describes a generic application protocol framework forconnection-oriented, asynchronous request/response interactions. Theframework permits multiplexing of independent request/responsestreams over a single transport connection, supporting both textualand binary messages.To subscribe to the Blocks discussion list, send e-mail[11]; thereis also a developers' site[12].
